name: gmail top tabs ( for google chrome )
description:
changes the top level navigation of google's gmail.
Moves the mail, contacts and tasks option to the top and makes them tabs. 
Adds more focus to the "compose mail" button by re-positioning and resizing it.

inspired by: http://www.dribbble.com/shots/44146-Redesigned-Redesign

firefox version: http://userstyles.org/styles/35651/
